LanguageData.Assembler69.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on factory assembly lines, putting together products with the help of robots.
LanguageData.Assembler69.title: assembler
LanguageData.BalletDancer81.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a dancer in a traditional ballet troupe. [PAWN_pronoun] mastered the ancient motions and entertained thousands.
LanguageData.BalletDancer81.title: ballet dancer
LanguageData.Builder96.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked on construction sites, building everyday structures according to [PAWN_possessive] boss' instructions.
LanguageData.Builder96.title: builder
LanguageData.ChurchPsychic98.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a psychic in the imperial church's psychic school.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] trained [PAWN_possessive] mind to sense the collective emotions and impressions of the people. It was a way to touch the spirit of the empire. It was also a way to root out heretical trends in thought.
LanguageData.ChurchPsychic98.title: church psychic
LanguageData.CorporateDrone10.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a very large office complex along with thousands of other suited drones.\n\nThe work itself consisted of endless organizational drudgery and pointless meetings, punctuated by the occasional performance review.
LanguageData.CorporateDrone10.title: corporate drone
LanguageData.CorporateFixer36.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fixer for an energy corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] work required knowing when to push, when to pull, when to back down and when to strike. The job fit [PAWN_possessive] natural lack of empathy.\n\nWhile violence was unusual, [PAWN_nameDef] stayed prepared for anything.
LanguageData.CorporateFixer36.title: corporate fixer
LanguageData.HeadButler50.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was the head servant in a royal house.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] managed the other servants to ensure the lord's will was done, even before the lord knew what it was.
LanguageData.HeadButler50.title: head butler
LanguageData.HouseServant86.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a low-level servant in a royal house.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] cleaned rooms and moved items as directed by the senior staff, while attempting to remain invisible to the lords and ladies of the house.
LanguageData.HouseServant86.title: house servant
LanguageData.ImperialInquisitor53.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an inquisitor in the imperial church's anti-heresy school.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] hunted unorthodox thoughts wherever they could be found - art, music, code, even private conversations. Upon finding deviance, [PAWN_pronoun] exposed it to bring on the punishment of the collective. And [PAWN_pronoun] could always find the deviance if [PAWN_pronoun] looked hard enough.
LanguageData.ImperialInquisitor53.title: imperial inquisitor
LanguageData.ImperialPriest24.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a priest in the imperial church.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] spent half [PAWN_possessive] time studying books to understand the relationship between God's aspects and the facets of [PAWN_possessive] society. The other half was spent preaching the evils of sloth and drink.
LanguageData.ImperialPriest24.title: imperial priest
LanguageData.Mailman2.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carried mail on [PAWN_possessive] assigned routes. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] was even sent to deliver special packages to stylish corporate offices or mansions.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] got pretty good at avoiding and fighting off angry dogs.
LanguageData.Mailman2.title: mailman
LanguageData.MenagerieKeeper1.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed the royal menagerie of a powerful family at their estate.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef]'s job saw [PAWN_pronoun] feeding elephants, tranquilizing lions, and training birds to display their plumage to titled visitors.
LanguageData.MenagerieKeeper1.title: menagerie keeper
LanguageData.OrnamentMaker56.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] crafted watches, medals, machined jewelry and other complex curios for royal patrons.
LanguageData.OrnamentMaker56.title: ornament maker
LanguageData.PlanetaryMiner64.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a mining engineer for a major planetary mining corporation. [PAWN_pronoun] work kept [PAWN_objective] underground for weeks at a time, and [PAWN_pronoun] grew to appreciate the darkness.
LanguageData.PlanetaryMiner64.title: planetary miner
LanguageData.RoyalCook18.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] made meals for [PAWN_possessive] aristocratic patrons.\n\nOnly the finest food was acceptable, so [PAWN_nameDef] tended a small garden on the mansion grounds to get the freshest herbs and vegetables. [PAWN_pronoun] fell in love with the food [PAWN_objective]self.
LanguageData.RoyalCook18.title: royal cook
LanguageData.RoyalMasseuse43.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a massage artist for an extended royal house. [PAWN_pronoun] serviced many members of the royal family, and their guests.\n\n[PAWN_nameDef] occasionally offered something extra, if the lord or lady was in the mood. Advancing in this line of work meant having refined social skills.
LanguageData.RoyalMasseuse43.title: royal masseuse
